list_definition.definition: done, said, finished etc in a short time
moving, or able to move, with speed

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I made a grab at the dog, but it was too quick for me.

list_definition.definition: doing something, able to do something, or done, without delay; prompt; lively

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is always quick to help
